explanation: The program computed the total cost when using the coupon as P - Q + D[i], which is incorrect. The coupon price for the drink is Q, so the total when using the coupon should be Q + D[i]. I replaced the incorrect expression with Q + D[i]. (No retrieved diff directly applied; this is a straightforward arithmetic fix.)
fixed_code:
N, P, Q = map(int, input().split())
D = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = P
for i in range(N):
    ret = Q + D[i]
    ans = min(ans, ret)

print(ans)
